name: Dr. Patricia Williams
description: Dr. Williams is a nationally recognized expert in education policy and research. She has advised numerous federal and state education initiatives and brings deep insights into educational equity and access.

name: Dr. Robert Martinez
description: Dr. Martinez is a prominent researcher in learning sciences and cognitive psychology. His work on student motivation and engagement has influenced tutoring practices nationwide.

name: Dr. Jennifer Kim
description: Dr. Kim is an expert in educational technology and data science. She has led large-scale research projects on the effectiveness of tutoring interventions and learning analytics.
